OOC: "Quiaff" and "quineg" are part of the clan dialect (I'm not an 
authority on Battletech but I know this much).  They mean "am I 
right?" and "am I wrong?", in that order.  "Aff" and "neg" mean "yes" 
and "no" while we're at it.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> OOC: what means "quiaf"?
> 
> ???:
> 
> 
> "I'm telling you all things that I can remember" replied the 
> femme "and about my caste, I'm warrior, are you warrior aren't 
you???"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Vlad: You do not seem very talkative, do you? That is all right. 
> You 
> > must know the caste you are in, quiaff?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > ???:
> > > 
> > > "I don't know... "said softly the femme.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Vlad was intrigued. A robot? A sentient robot?
> > > > 
> > > > Vlad: All right, for now.
> > > > 
> > > > He transforms to man mode, leaves his pistols on his hips and 
> sits 
> > > > down on a nearby rock.
> > > > 
> > > > Vlad: I am new to this planet too. Where do you come from?
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > ???:
> > > > > 
> > > > > "I'm a robot" she replied "Don't ask me more 'cause it 
seems 
> > that 
> > > my 
> > > > > memory circuits are damaged; I even can't remember what's 
my 
> > > > name..." 
> > > > > she carefully sat down in a rock and with a friendly smile 
> she 
> > > > > invited at Vlad to do the same on other nearest rocks"Come 
on 
> > sit 
> > > > > down... why don't we just... chat"
